name: Corpse Master Carnage
description:
LET THE CARNAGE BEGIN!

In Corpse Master Carnage, Raven, Hope and other characters need to fight hordes of demons (as usual), but what seems like a common activity for them turns out to be much darker than expected.

MORE OPTIONS THAN EVER!

Now you can choose your favorite character from the Corpse Master universe! Each of them has its own special ability dedicated to each type of player, those who like to play safe, those who like to play exclusively to kill and even those who like to farm faster!

IMPROVEMENTS IMPROVEMENTS IMPROVEMENTS!

In Corpse Master Carnage, you will be presented with mountains of improvement possibilities, you can level up your character, unlock new maps, buy and improve your perks, unlock artifacts with unique abilities, buy new weapons, improve your weapons, unlock weapons secret specials and MUCH MORE!

Plus, ALL IMPROVEMENTS ARE ENDLESS! That's right! As long as you have blood running through your veins you can improve ALL of your character's ATTRIBUTES infinitely, you can become the true BOSS of the game!

DISCOVER THE SECRET BEHIND CORPSE MASTER CARNAGE

The game has a well-crafted lore hidden from the public, you'll have to explore to find it. But don't just settle for that, as some maps even have ENTIRE QUESTS hidden, you can play and discover traces of the story while looking for secrets within the game, as well as being rewarded for this, with achievements and SPECIAL EXCLUSIVE weapons.
